The shots hit Shokaract on his treads. Sparks scattered. Shokaract silently=
 changes his direction of fire, not muttering a single sound, not even brea=
th, as he fired his 2 smaller missiles at Hell Drak...

  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 3:40 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack!/Or=
ion/Shokaract


  ::Necromancer/Hell Drak::

  Necromancer transformed into=
 bat mode and flew out of the way of the shots.
  He flew up on Orion's sho=
ulder.

  "I don't mean to seem like a parasite, but, I may be able to fit =
down there
  and chase after h-" Necromancer was suddenly struck by a snipe=
r bullet from
  Headshot!

  Necromancer went flying back and onto the grou=
nd, mech-fluids pouring out of
  his wing.  Necromancer transformed to robo=
t mode again, and had mech-fluid
  coming from his shoulder.  Hell Drak too=
k some of the shots from Blindfear.

  "Hey!  Nobody attacks my brother and=
 tries to kill me at the same time!  Get
  ready to mess with one tough b**=
ch!" Hell Drak said, running out and firing
  some shots at Shokaract.
  --=
